Keyword.Selector: select package where package.name ~= "7-Zip 19.00"
select package where package.name ~= "7-Zip 18.05"

Keyword.Name: Other
Keyword.Selector: select package where package.name ~= "7-Zip"

Keyword.Name: Current
Keyword.Selector: select package where package.name ~= "7-Zip 19.00" AND package.name like "*(x64*"

Keyword.Name: Other
Keyword.Selector: select package where package.name ~= "7-Zip"
select package where package.name ~= "Adobe Acrobat Reader DC" AND package.version = "21.001.20155" AND package.type = package
select package where package.name ~= "Adobe Acrobat Reader DC" AND package.version ~= "21.001" AND package.type = package
select package where package.name ~= "Adobe Acrobat Reader DC" AND package.version = "21.005.20048" AND package.type = package
select package where package.name ~= "Adobe Acrobat Reader DC" AND package.version ~= "21.005" AND package.type = package

Keyword.Name: Other
Keyword.Selector: select package where package.name ~= "Adobe Acrobat Reader DC" AND package.type = package

Keyword.Name: Current
Keyword.Selector: select package where package.type = package AND package.name ~= "Adobe Acrobat Reader DC" AND package.version ~= "21.007"

Keyword.Name: Other
Keyword.Selector: select package where package.type = package AND package.name ~= "Adobe Acrobat Reader DC"
select package where package.name = "Google Chrome" AND package.version ~= "88.0.4324"
select package where package.name = "Google Chrome" AND package.version ~= "89.0.4389"
select package where package.name = "Google Chrome" AND package.version ~= "90.0.4430"
select package where package.name = "Google Chrome" AND package.version ~= "91.0.4472"

Keyword.Name: Other
Keyword.Selector: select package where package.name = "Google Chrome"

Keyword.Name: Current
Keyword.Selector: select package where package.name = "Google Chrome" AND package.version ~= "96.0"

Keyword.Name: Other
Keyword.Selector: select package where package.name = "Google Chrome"

Keyword.Name: a) 0-6
Keyword.Selector: select source where source.days_since_last_boot <= 7 AND source.days_since_last_time <= 30

Keyword.Name: b) 7-10
Keyword.Selector: select source where source.days_since_last_boot <= 11 AND source.days_since_last_time <= 30

Keyword.Name: c) 11-14
Keyword.Selector: select source where source.days_since_last_boot <= 15 AND source.days_since_last_time <= 30

Keyword.Selector: select source where source.days_since_last_time <= 30
